summary: Eliminates the \"slow zoom in/out\" effect when switching POV and mounting/dismounting horses.
descriptionHtml:
IMPORTANT NOTE: This was a very early \"hack\" mod made before the Construction Kit was released. Due to possible game patches/updates, this may or may not work for your game.

I found it really annoying that if I was zoomed out in 3rd person for exploring, then ran into enemies and pressed F to switch to 1st person, the camera would ever so slowly zoom in to my character before I was back in 1st person. Similarly, when dismounting a horse to engage in a fight the camera took it\'s sweet time to get back to where it belonged. These tweaks will do 3 things:

1. Pressing F will now instantly switch between 1st and 3rd person POV.

2. Pressing F while in 3rd person zoomed-out mode will instantly switch to 1st person POV.

3. When mounting and dismounting a horse, the camera POV will switch instantly (You\'ll still see the mount/dismount animation, but there is no delay before or after while the camera \"flies\" to the correct position).

Enjoy!

*Updated to v1.1 to fix game not remembering 3rd person camera position.*
author: Graxster
